text: The famous Sudarshana Chakra (wheel) is whirling on the finger of Lord Vishnu.
Through this wheel, God teaches the human kind that the cycle of the universe is whirling at his will.
If anybody tries to go against his will (i.
wheel) or gives up religion and begins to behave irreligiously, I will whirl him like the wheel or punish him with the wheel.
title: Reason for holding the Wheel
